title: Prince Richard, Duke of Gloucester
summary: Prince Richard, Duke of Gloucester, KG, GCVO, GCStJ, FRIBA (Richard Alexander Walter George; born 26 August 1944) is a member of the British royal family. He is the second son of Prince Henry, Duke of Gloucester and Princess Alice, Duchess of Gloucester, as well as the youngest of the nine grandchildren of King George V and Queen Mary. He is currently 31st in line of succession to the British throne, and the highest person on the list who is not a direct descendant of King George VI, who was his uncle.
